title: Ammonia Removal in Different Depth of Vertical Flow Wetland …
description:
In this paper, the pre-aeration, activated carbon and anthracite filler vertical subsurface flow constructed wetland simulation system was described. The main changes under different pre-aeration time and hydraulic loading were discussed in the vertical flow wetland system about NH3-N removal effect. When ammonia nitrogen concentration changed under hydraulic loading of 0.064 m3 / (m2•d) and preaeration time of 10 minutes, the removal effect of ammonia was the best.
http://www.ivypub.org/fes/paperInfo.aspx?ID=2602

title: An Approach of Underwater Targets Detection via Backscattering Noise
description: The backward scatter that occurred with underwater light spreading is very strong, and it can occur a serious background noise in underwater imaging which causes underwater image fuzzy. And it is difficult to detect underwater targets. So how to detect underwater targets with the low Signal to Noise Ratio is the question that people concern. The traditional methods of underwater dim targets detection have some limitations on image contrast, gray scale or size of target, and so on. We deduced the model of backscattering noise by studying the characteristics of underwater image, and then we used the model to detect the underwater targets with low SNR. The results of the experiment showed that this method was effective.  http://www.sjie.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=323

title: An Empirical Study of Acquiring Health Information by Micro-blogging: Taking Plurk for Example
description: As micro-blogging services such as Twitter or Plurk increase in popularity this paper what kind of factors affect the general public health information system to track the use of intentions. It examines the search behavior of users of Plurk, a popular social networking service in Taiwan.We refine and apply a theoretical model of health beliefs to identify factors that significantly affect search behavior for health information, after performing regression analysis on data from an online questionnaire with 107 effective respondents over a two-week period in May 2010.We find that the behavior of the majority of Plurkers seeking health information was influenced by three key factors: trust, social influence, and perceived barriers to taking action.These results offer suggestions for ways to increase public use of important health information. http://www.sjae.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=1162

title: An Improved Method for Vietnam License Plate Location
description: The License Plate Location (LPL) is the key step in the Automatic License Plate Recognition (ALPR). In this paper we proposed a new LPL algorithm for Vietnam license plates (LP), which included preprocessing, morphology operation and image subtraction on grayscale image, image binarization based on threshold, edge detection using Canny operator, morphology operation on binary image, finding the LP angle & rotating LP based Radon transform and bilinear interpolation, and then cutting exactly LP region based on measuring properties of Vietnam LP regions. Our proposed approach is more effective than some earlier existing method and is satisfied with Vietnam LP. We implemented 500 images taken from different light conditions (night and day), LP angles, illumination, sizes and types of LP, colors, and reflected light. The average rate of accuracy is 97.27% for all of types and colors of Vietnam LP.   http://www.sjie.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=461

title: An Improved Method to Determine the Weight and Its Application
description: This paper presents an evaluation method of the highway pavement performance. We select four main evaluation factors which affect pavement performance. We ascertain the weight according to both of the objective methods and the subjective methods, that is to say the membership function is based on attribute measures along with the calculation of entropy and fuzzy comprehensive evaluation model is established by the fuzzy rules decided by weight computing. With the evaluation of performance for highway pavement, a fuzzy comprehensive evaluation system is built based on FIS toolbox in MATLAB. The evaluation method is proved to be feasible and effective through the analyses of real cases. The evaluation method presented by this paper is of instructive significance, which gains an ideal effect and is quite to the factual conditions.  http://www.sjie.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=593

title: An Infrared and Visible Image Registration Based on SURF
description: In view of the slow speed of SIFT (scale invariant feature transform), a method of image registration based on SURF (speeded up robust features) was proposed. Firstly, interest points were detected by using SURF and the dimension of the descriptor was 64. Then we selected Euclidean distance as the matching method. Due to the error matching, an improved RANSAC (Random Sample Consensus) was proposed to get rid of them. For their difference, infrared and visible image was preprocessed by edge extraction to improve the similarity between them. Experiment results show the effectiveness of this method.  http://www.sjie.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=227

title: Analysis of Energy Consumption and the Sensitivity based on Battery Electric Bus
description:
The mathematical model for evaluation on the economy of energy consumption and parametric sensitivity of bus whose driving force is just electricity was established as well as the standard of economic consumption, based on the definition made on conventional assessment on the economic consumption of combustion motor. According to the actual driving demand of electric bus, the paper analyzed the energy consumption under the accelerating/coasting mode, and verified the feasibility of the model by comparing the test results of simulation and real vehicle. Finally, the paper simulated the vehicle energy consumption trends under condition of acceleration, and then analyzed the parametric sensitivity of the economy of energy consumption. The results of this paper provide the scientific basis for optimization of power system and improvement on the fuel economy of battery electric bus.
http://www.ivypub.org/med/paperInfo.aspx?ID=2436

title: Analysis of Micro Blogging Users’ Classification and Behavior
description: Based on the classification theory in network community and combined with the features of micro blogging users, this paper initiatively divides micro blogging users into 10 categories and then continues to divide them into different groups according to Maslow's hierarchy of needs. This method is different from the one that divides users only once by Maslow’s needs. The research lays a solid foundation for the future research on micro blogging. Meanwhile, it enables those enterprises which use micro blogging to market and improve their images to better identify their users group.  http://www.sjae.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=778

title: Analysis of Multi-Service Multi-Access Protocol Based on Gated-Polling Control for Ad Hoc Network
description: A multi-service multi-access protocol based on gated-polling control (MSGPMA) for ad hoc network was presented. Packets with different service arrive at user terminal with different arrival rate, and could be transmitted with different transmission time. The average queue length and approximated mean waiting time of MSGPMA protocol were obtained. The results show that the simulation is in concordance with the theoretical analysis. http://www.sjie.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=1784

title: Analysis of Project-based Teaching in Motor Control Applications
description: Given the situation that the students show little interest in the motor control system course and the classroom teaching isn't effective, we propose that project-based teaching method should be adopted in the teaching of motor control system course. Project-based teaching method is project-oriented and task-driven, which has improved students' study initiative and comprehensive practical ability. The method has great popularization prospect in teaching the practical professional courses.  http://www.erfrontier.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=634

title: Analysis on Climate Variation Rules of Tai'an in Recent 30 Years
description: This paper analyze the climate variation rules of recent 30 years using the temperature and precipitation data of Tai'an from 1981 to 2010. As it turned out, climate warming significantly of Tai'an in nearly 30 years with obvious cold and warm stage turning change characteristic,and the minimum temperature rising make main contribution to the temperatures Rising, obtaining the strongest warming in the Early Years of 21 Century; From the view of long-term change trends of annual precipitation, precipitation presented the trend of fluctuational rising , and rainy periods and drought periods appeared alternatively with a4-9 year cycle. climate is becoming warm and humid and it will continue in the future.  http://www.j-es.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=1203

title: Analysis on Correlation between the Development of Rural Tourism and the New Rural Construction
description: Looking for quiet, harmonious, and natural rurality through rural tourism has become a demand and trend for urban residents in the 21st century. The development of rural tourism can promote the new rural construction and the latter brings new opportunities for the former. The harmony between the two sides is based on the construction of harmonious society.  http://www.jma-journal.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=956

title: Analysis on Fractal Features of Labor Productivity of Manufacturing Industry Time Series
description:
According to the data of manufacturing industry, phase-space of time series was reconstructed based on the phase-space reconstruction theory. The fractal features of labor productivity of manufacturing industry time series were studied by using G-P (Grassberger-Procaccia) arithmetic，correlation dimension of labor productivity of manufacturing industry time series and delay time were calculated out. The results indicate that the dynamic system of labor productivity of manufacturing industry has a steady correlation dimension of 0.948 after the embedded dimension comes to 6, which explains that at least one factor is controlling the dynamic changes of accidents time series, and the effective freedom is 6. The research provides much reference value for establishing comparative evaluation models and management system of labor productivity of manufacturing industry time series.
http://www.ivypub.org/msr/paperInfo.aspx?ID=2285

title: Analysis on Ore-controlling Factors in Ertan Region, Dulan County, Qinghai Province
description: Based on detailed geological information, we investigate metallogenic features of proved orebody in Ertan region, and summarize its regional minerogenetic condition. Through analyzing the relationship between mineralization and ore-controlling factors like strata, structure, magmatic rock and wall rock alteration, we can conclude that geological structure is the main ore-controlling factor. For developing numerous faults, a series of well-developed endogenous ore points formed in the binding site. The binding sites between fracture zones and gray matter skarns, crushed zones in skarn formations and contact zones between griotte and alternated sandstones are proved to be the most optimistic metallogenic parts. http://www.j-es.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=1075

title: Analysis on Uranium Metallization Condition of Jurassic Zhiluo Formation in Middle of Eastern Ordos Basin
description: This article has widely collected uranium geological data and deposits of coal, oil systems prospecting information in the region based on the use of uranium ore into the water theory, and through analysis on the geological background of eastern part of Ordos Basin, the ZhiLuo Formation stratum structure, characteristics of lithofacies, Uranium mineralization in the regional distribution of uranium mineralization conditions. It is found that in the north of the desert grassland area in the BaiYu Mountains, ZhiLuo Formation is located in the transitional parts between river course subfacies and valley flat subfacies sand, where sand thickness is moderate, cementation is fluffy; and we have found Dongsheng large uranium deposits in northern, with a layer of sandstone-type uranium deposits of the most favorable areas. In addition, in the Loess Plateau of the central part of work area, the layer of oxidation is relatively poor, and uranium mineralization is mainly controlled by organic sediment and ash green alteration zone.  http://www.j-es.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=1103

title: APRS World Database
description:
[begin excerpt from Integrating the Aprsworld Database Into Your Application] The aprsworld.net project was started in March 2001 by James Jefferson Jarvis, KB0THN. The goal from the beginning has ben to parse the APRS internet stream into data that can be stored in a relational database system. As the time of writing (September 2003) about 1 million raw APRS packets traverse the internet stream each day. Each one of these packets is parsed and inserted into the appropriate table of the aprsworld.net database. These results in about 5 million inserts a day, with an average of about 60 inserts / queries per second. The database grows by about 6 gigabytes per month. By using the aprsworld.net database you can save the trouble of collecting, parsing, and storing this large ammount of data. Simple operations like finding the last position of a APRS station are extremely easy - and more complex dataminning operations are possible with minimum effort. [end excerpt]

aprsworld-to-XML Interface

This script provides an XML interface to aprsworld.net, so you don't need to have direct access to the aprsworld or findu databases, or know SQL, in order to get generalized and standardly formatted APRS data directly from the Internet into your application. Free code libraries for parsing XML are easy to find for almost any programming environment. As new minor versions of this script are made available, they will reside in their own directory containing the version number, so you can safely link to a script without future upgrade changes affecting anything. (bugfix-level versions will not have their own directory)

title: Argo
description:
Argo is a global array of 3,000 free-drifting profiling floats that measures the temperature and salinity of the upper 2000 m of the ocean.  This allows, for the first time, continuous monitoring of the temperature, salinity, and velocity of the upper ocean, with all data being relayed and made publicly available within hours after collection.


From http://www.argo.ucsd.edu/Acknowledging_Argo2.html:


Since Argo data are made freely available we ask that where Argo data are used in a publication or product, the following acknowledgement is given:

" These data were collected and made freely available by the International Argo Project and the national programs that contribute to it.  (http://www.argo.ucsd.edu,  http://argo.jcommops.org).  Argo is a pilot program of the Global Ocean Observing System."

If you plan to use or are using Argo data, the Argo Steering Team requests that, as a courtesy, you inform the groups responsible for the floats that you are using of the type of study you are undertaking.  You can find who to contact by going to argo.jcommops.org to the quick link "Find floats" and enter the WMO or Telecom ID.

title: Buy Wireless Burglar Alarm to Secure Your Residence
description: Nowadays, a crime can take place even in ones own residence, a lot more and more folks are buying burglar alarm for their homes given that this is the safest point to do in securing safety not just for their possessions, but for their household as properly. Because of the increasing demand for burglar alarms, these are additional created to provide far more efficiency. And a single of the most demanded designs these days is the wireless burglar alarms. These systems do not necessitate wires anymore to be connected to a single one more. Instead these utilize radio waves coming from the diverse sensors connected to the manage panel to observe the activities inside the house. The system of wireless burglar alarm is the utilization of motion sensors with the get in touch with in the door and window to notify that there is an intruder within or close to the property. The method is directed by a keypad situated in a portion of the home. This keypad can activate or deactivate the alarm system remotely. Right here are the following elements that composes the wireless burglar alarm: Handle Panel: The wireless systems brain. This is situated in a cabinet, cellar or attic for safety purposes. The function of this is to get signals coming from the sensors which have been set up about the spot. The alarm right away sounds when the sensors transmit a warning that directs to the Manage Panel. If the alarm method is monitored aside from the sounding of the alarm, the monitoring unit is offered an alert by the Control Panel to contact for the suitable authorities. Keypad: As the name implies, it s exactly where the code is keyed in to either activate or deactivate the technique. Along with the evolution of the alarm program, the keypad today becomes easier to use. Keypad is assisted by illuminating screens when employed throughout nigh time. Click here intruder alarm systems to study the meaning behind it. It also incorporates the function keys feature of single-touch, which permits the press of a single button to activate or deactivate the alarm method. Magnetic Contacts: Here, the magnet is situated near the switch location that calculates the augmentation of distance between the magnet and the switch spot. This is set up at the doors and windows guarded by the program. The switch directly sounds an alarm when the activated system detected any improve in the distance of the sensors, like when the doors and windows are forcibly opened. Make contact with sensors: These make use of a reactive infrared light which perceives motion or physique heat in an enclosed spot. These are also termed as PIRs or Passive Infrared Sensors, and these are typically utilized when the residence occupants are not around. These are positioned on the house spots which are uncommonly used and a persons presence is not most likely to be expected. PIRs sound an alarm when it perceives motion or physique heat in the region. House safety cameras: these are added protection, these can be set up by way of wireless signals that transmit directly to video monitors any activities in the location it covers. title: The Gateway to Astronaut Photography of Earth
description:
A database of all photographs and related data from or about space from 1961 collected by NASA. It includes data from the International Space Station, NASA's Earth Observatory and flight missions.

NASA provides [non-binding guidance](http://eol.jsc.nasa.gov/Info/use.htm) about the use of its materials. Its short version follows:

> For astronaut photography of Earth accessed through this website, please state "Image courtesy of the Image Science & Analysis Laboratory, NASA Johnson Space Center." We recommend that the caption for any photograph published include the unique photo number (Mission-Roll-Frame), and our website (http://eol.jsc.nasa.gov) so that others can locate or obtain copies when needed. We always appreciate notification of beneficial uses of astronaut photography of Earth-information on your applications. This will help us continue to maintain these services for the public. Send e-mail to jsc-earthweb@mail.nasa.gov.

title: Asymptotic Stability Problem for Discrete-time Systems with Quantized Feedback over Channel Model
description: This paper investigates the problem of asymptotic stability for discrete-time linear systems with quantized state feedback over channel model. We discussed the controller design combined with channel model and quantizer design. The sufficient conditions of asymptotic stability for those systems are presented and the method of controller design is also obtained. Finally, the effectiveness of the proposed conditions is demonstrated by a numerical example.  http://www.sj-ce.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=96

description: For those of us who create and submit articles to various content directories, we do so mainly for 1 explanation:To get the hyperlink back to our website.However, its crucial to keep in thoughts that not all links are equal in the eyes of the key search engines.How your hyperlinks seem to the search engines can be almost as substantial as the quantity of hyperlinks that truly point to your website. As you cultivate links to your internet site, the aim is to have as organic a hyperlink structure as possible.What this indicates is that search engines like to see hyperlinks presented in a manner that does not appear to be phony, or an effort to fool the search engines into pondering your website is more well-known than it actually is.In our efforts to do this, it is essential to hold in thoughts the following: Initial, your incoming hyperlinks ought to improve steadily.Search engines see a sudden jump in links as artificial and not an indication of your internet sites popularity.When you submit your articles to an write-up directory, your links generally increase gradually as they are picked up more than time and published on internet web sites and archived ezines. Second, whenever achievable, your incoming hyperlinks ought to not be reciprocal.Many of you are now saying, easier mentioned than accomplished.Possibly, but submitting articles to write-up directories is a fantastic way to construct these types of links. Search engines view internet sites that rely heavily on reciprocal hyperlinks as not necessarily containing sought-following content material that other individuals want to voluntarily link to.That is, pure hyperlink reciprocity implies that the only objective of the hyperlink is to create links and has absolutely nothing to do with the quality of the content on the web site. Third, its quite crucial to be consistent in how the link to your site is published.The following example will illustrate this point: The following URLs all point to the exact same web page, of course.Nevertheless, as far as the key search engines are concerned, they are all distinct: http://articlelists.com http://articlelists.com/ http://articlelists.com/index.html http://www.articlelists.com http://www.articlelists.com/ http://www.articlelists.com/index.html For that reason, if your incoming hyperlinks differ as listed above, your web page rank is getting watered down by up to a aspect of six.So if you are not already doing it, be confident to be constant in how you have your incoming links published. This final item discussed here concerns anchor text.Anchor text is the actual text that appears for a distinct hyperlink, and is perhaps one of the most important troubles to consider when building your incoming link structure. For instance, in the following hyperlink, Free Write-up Directory, the words Free Report Directory constitute the anchor text.Nevertheless, when you place your cursor over the hyperlink you will see the destination site, www.ArticleLists.com, displayed in the status bar. There are two important guidelines of thumb to remember about your anchor text.The initial is that your anchor text ought to differ.That is, the incoming hyperlinks to your web site ought to not all have the same anchor text. This creates a a lot more all-natural appearance to the search engines and will aid in your rankings.The second rule is to spot your keywords and phrases into your anchor text anytime achievable.The cause this is crucial is since search engines view the anchor text as an indication of the topic of your webpage. So you get a two-for-1 effect:You not only get the preferred inbound link, but you also create a a lot more natural-searching incoming hyperlink structure which will be viewed more favorably by the search engines.Of course, you would very first want to do some keyword investigation to decide the reputation and value of a variety of keywords and phrases relating to your internet site, and then use the ones for which you are trying to rank nicely. title: Drug Addiction And Recovery
description: Though addiction to drugs like opium have been frequent considering that historical occasions it is in latest times that the difficulty has been exacerbated drastically. Thi.. Several emotional or psychological causes may possibly drive you into taking drugs. At occasions it is mere curiosity that propels you to develop an addiction to drugs more than time. Drug addiction refers to the compulsive use of psychoactive drugs to such a level at which the user of drugs has no other way out and continues to use it. Even though addiction to drugs like opium have been common considering that historical times it is in recent times that the issue has been exacerbated significantly. This is primarily due to the cultivation of plants yielding drugs, advancements in biochemistry and improvements in implies of finding access to drugs. The introduction of purified types of active biological agents and the synthesis of new substances like methamphetamine has made drugs a lot more widespread. Clinically, the word addiction has been replaced by the word dependency in relation to drugs. It may be noted that not all persons are equally prone to addiction. If you think anything, you will maybe hate to study about advertiser. Replacement drugs like methadone are also utilized. title: Fusion Cooking  Blended Cuisines
description: What do you get when you cross hot Indian food with the English like of tomatoes and all points creamy? Chicken Tikka Masala is a popular combination of chicken tikka and masala.Chicken tikka is a marinated piece of meat cooked in a tandoor, an Indian oven produced of clay and coal-fired. Masala is gravy typically produced out of some kind of tomato gravy or puree with cream and a range of Indian spices.It is technically a mild curry dish, although the addition of sometimes big amounts of tartrazine causes the dish to oftentimes appear orange.In other recipes, it can look something from red to orange to green. Chicken Tikka Masala is possibly the most well-liked Indian dish in the world, and has arguably replaced tandoori chicken as the flagship of Indian meals, like on the subcontinent itself it even has a musical written singing its praises.In the United Kingdom alone, Marks & Spencer, the renowned English retailer, claims to sell 18 tons a week of the chicken in Tikka Masala Sandwiches, even though 23 million servings a year are sold at Indian restaurants. Sainsburys, one more retailer, sells 1.6 million dishes every single year, and stocks 16 diverse products containing what is affectionately identified as CTM.10 tons a day are manufactured by Noon Goods to later be sold at supermarkets. The chicken, even though extensively considered an Indian dish, does not hail from India. Kitchens from London to Glasgow claim to have originated the dish, which was first noticed in the late 1960s.According to urban legend, the dish was developed by a Bangladeshi chef in Britain when he served chicken tandoor to an Englishman only to be asked, wheres my gravy? The outcome? A mixture of cream of tomato soup and spices, which he named masala.And like that, chicken tikka masala was born, an early example of what we would now call fusion cooking.It is now so popular that British politician and Foreign Secretary Robin Cook when described it as, a true British national dish, citing its combination of authentic Indian cooking with the British need to have their meat served with gravy. What goes into a chicken tikka masala? Nicely, a 1998 survey indicated that of 48 versions, the only prevalent ingredient was chicken.A well-known recipe involves chicken marinated overnight in yogurt, ginger, garlic, cardamom powder, cumin, white pepper, and other spices.The chicken is cooked briefly in the hot tandoor, and is then served with a sauce produced of tomato, ginger, garlic, cream, green and red pepper, and an assortment of spices.The sauce is poured more than the chicken right after it is cooked. In contrast to tandoori chicken, on which it is primarily based, the taste is mild and creamy, rather than spicy. Is chicken tikka masala an English or an Indian dish? The answer is unclear, as it has been adopted so readily that it is served in just about every single Indian restaurant, an indication that Indians have accepted it as their own.A variety of English firms now specialize in exporting the dish back to India.Whatever its origins, however, it is now enjoyed by millions every year. title: CAN Bus Extension of the Dynamic Display Module of a Millimeter Anti-Collision Radar
description: The dynamic display module, an essential part for auto anti-collision radar system, depends on the CAN bus to realize the communication with the front end of the auto anti-collision radar system as a component of the automotive electronics system. This article describes an embedded system approach based on ARM11 (with S3C6410 as the main control chip) as the core of hardware platforms, with Linux operating system as the software platform for the auto anti-collision radar dynamic display module. We expand the MCP2515 CAN bus-based architecture on the traditional SPI subsystem, and realize the data communications of auto electronic system in the embedded systems. We also present the specific hardware circuit design and implementation of our embedded system platform based on Linux.   http://www.sj-ce.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=729

title: Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA)
description:
List of development projects funded by CIDA

## Details
The Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA) is Canada's lead agency for development assistance.
CIDA was established in 1968 to administer the bulk of Canada's official development assistance (ODA) program.
The Project Browser contains more than 2,400 profiles of projects funded by the Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA).
CIDA is progressively publishing all of its operational projects in the Project Browser. The Project Browser does not yet contain all projects from all CIDA programs.

title: How'd They Vote? - Canadian MPs in focus
description:
### About

From website:

> Have you ever wondered how your member of parliament has been voting? We've made it easy for you to find out! Contained herein are many of the pivotal votes in the House of Commons, complete with voting history, dissension, attendance and speaking habits.

### Openness

Not open. [Copyright page](http://howdtheyvote.ca/copyright.php) states:

> The information is freely available for any use (referral links are appreciated), with the following limitations:

1.1 Frames and Affiliation
Loading the site in a frame and presenting the content in a partisan context, or otherwise representing yourself as being affiliated with this site, is prohibited.

1.2 Hansard/Crown Copyright and Parliamentary Privilege
Some legislatures require written permission to republish Hansard or portions of their website, and may limit commercial use. If you choose to republish any data from this site, you are responsible for acquiring approval to republish it (if necessary). As well, be aware that you are not protected by Parliamentary Privilege.

States have to put policies in place with incentives that encourage consumers to switch, he said. Those incentives could involve making CNG fueling stations available, subsidizing vehicles or in-home fueling stations, or by lowering retail prices for natural gas. Surveys indicate that NGVs are as safe or safer than those powered by other fuels. title: Biblioteca Nacional Escolar (BNEscolar)
description:
La Biblioteca Nacional Escolar (BNEscolar) es una colección de más de 8.500 documentos digitalizados de la Biblioteca Digital Hispánica. Está constituida por un conjunto de contenidos elegidos, además de por su indudable valor cultural, por su utilidad para enriquecer y complementar los contenidos educativos del currículo de enseñanzas medias. 

La BNEscolar nació en el marco de la colaboración entre la Bliblioteca Nacional de España (BNE) y GNOSS en el proyecto Spanish Culture in Linked Open Data: Explotación semántica y valorización educativa de los bienes culturales españoles.

Está estructurada en tres secciones: Arte, Dibujos de los niños de la guerra y Otras colecciones. La primera de ellas engloba más de  2400 obras de arte de las colecciones de Grabados de Durero, Obras de Goya, Estampas Japonesas, Grabados flamencos y holandeses...de gran riqueza cultural. La  segunda de ellas comprende íntegramente la colección de Dibujos de los niños de la guerra. Un conjunto de cerca de 1200 dibujos, pintados por niños acogidos en diversas instituciones de España y Francia, que representa la mirada infantil del conflicto bélico y de escenas de la vida cotidiana en esa época. La tercera de ellas, Otras Colecciones, incluye más de 5.000 obras culturales sobre diversas disciplinas pertenecientes a quince diferentes colecciones de la BNE como: Teatro del Siglo de Oro, Quijotes, Material Cartográfico Manuscrito, Historia de la Ciencia, entre otras.


National School Library

The National School Library (BNEscolar) is a collection of over 8,500 digitalized documents of the Hispanic Digital Library. It is constituted for a set of chosen contents, in addition to its indubitable cultural value, because of its usefulness to enrich and complement educational contents of the intermediate education curriculum.

The BNEscolar was born in the context of teamwork between Spanish School Library BNE and GNOSS on the project Spanish Culture in Linked Open Data: semantic exploitation and educational valorization of Spanish cultural goods.

It is structured into three sections: Art, Children’s drawings of war and Other collections. The first of them includes more than 2,400 artworks from collections of Engravings by Dürer, Works of Goya, Japanese Prints, Flemish and Dutch Engravings … culturally rich. The second of them includes entirely the collection of Children’s drawings of war. A whole of about 1,200 drawings, painted by fostered children by different institutions of Spain and France, which represents childish look of the war conflict and scenes of daily life at this time. The third of them, Other collections, includes over 5,000 artworks about several disciplines belonging to fifteen different collections of BNE like: Spanish Golden Age Theatre, Quijotes, Manuscript Cartographic Material, History of Science, among other artworks.

Bibliothèque National Scolaire

La Bibliothèque National Scolaire (BNEscolar) est une collection de plus de 8.500 documents digitalisés de la Bibliothèque National Hispanique. Elle est constituée d’un ensemble de contenus sélectionnés, en plus de son indubitable valeur culturelle, pour son utilité pour enrichir et complémenter les contenus éducatifs du curriculum d’enseignements secondaires.

La BNEscolar est né dans le cadre de collaboration entre la Bibliothèque Nationale Espagnole BNE et GNOSS dans le projet Spanish Culture in Linked Open Data : exploitation sémantique et valorisation éducative des biens culturels espagnols.

Elle est divisée en trois sections : Art, Dessins des enfants de la guerre et Autres collections. La première comprend plus de 2.400 œuvres d’art des collections des Gravures de Dürer, des Ouvres de Goya, des Estampes japonaises, des Gravures flamands et hollandais … d’une grande richesse culturelle. La deuxième comprend entièrement la collection des Dessins des enfants de la guerre. Un ensemble d’environ 1.200 dessins, peint par des enfants accueillis par des institutions d’Espagne et de la France, que représente le regard enfantin de la guerre et des scènes de la vie quotidienne dans cette époque. La troisième, Autres collections, comprend plus de 5.000 œuvres culturelles sur diverses disciplines dans quinze différents collections de la BNE comme : Théâtre de l’Age d’Or, Quijotes, Matériel Cartographique Manuscrit, Histoire de la Science, entre autres.

title: AEGP, Spanish Textile and Clothing Association
description:
Semantic catalog of the Spanish Textile and Clothing Association (AEGP) companies. AEGP is a voluntary professional national association that promotes the competitiveness of its companies through the promotion, defense and representation of their professional, economic and work interests. It offers specialized services that enhance their position in the environment. The catalog includes 2,500 textile and clothing companies.

AEGP works with GNOSS software (RIAM Intelearning Lab). RIAM is a company that develops semantic technology for the creation of specialized networks and linked markets. The project includes a faceted-based search engine and enriched contexts. Both are developments by GNOSS.

Catálogo semántico de las empresas de la Agrupación Española del Género de Punto (AEGP). AEGP es una asociación profesional voluntaria de ámbito estatal cuyo objetivo es impulsar la competitividad de las empresas asociadas, a través del fomento, la defensa y la representación de sus intereses laborales, profesionales y económicos y, mediante una oferta de servicios especializados que les permitan mejorar su posición en el entorno. El catálogo recoge 2500 empresas del sector.

AEGP trabaja con software de GNOSS (RIAM Intelearning Lab). RIAM es una compañía que desarrolla tecnología semántica para la creación de redes especializadas y mercados enlazados. El proyecto incluye un buscador facetado y contextos enriquecidos.

title: Arthroscopy community
description:
The arthroscopy community is the adecuate space for all those who take part on the arthroscopic surgical procedures of the locomotor system. Its meaning is to create and share knowledge concerning the answers to the current and effective matters on these kind of arthroscopic proceedings: surgical, anesthesic, rehabilitative or even organizing ones.

The arthroscopy community works with GNOSS software (RIAM Intelearning Lab). RIAM is a company that develops semantic technology for the creation of specialized networks and linked markets. It includes a facet-based search engine and enriched contexts. Both are developments by GNOSS.

Portal de Artroscopia es un espacio de aprendizaje para todas las personas que participan en los procedimientos quirúrgicos artroscópicos del aparato locomotor. El propósito es generar y compartir conocimiento sobre las soluciones a los problemas reales y concretos en este tipo procedimientos, sean estos quirúrgicos, de anestesia, de rehabilitación o de organización.

Portal de Artroscopia trabaja con software de GNOSS (RIAM Intelearning Lab). RIAM es una compañía que desarrolla tecnología semántica para la creación de redes especializadas y mercados enlazados. El proyecto Incluye un buscador facetado y contextos enriquecidos. Ambos son desarrollos de GNOSS.

title: Athelia RFID, a global knowledge network of RFID technology
description:
Athelia Solutions , a company specialized in tracking solutions based on RFID technology (Radio Frequency Identification) and Mobile Data Capture, renewed its digital identity with a global knowledge network designed to share content and opinion about RFID technology in Oil & Gas, Food & Beverage, Energy & Utilities and Healthcare. The online global network of Athelia includes a professional community, called Athelia Community , and a portfolio of services and solutions of the company.

It is focused on specialists in this field: users of technologies for traceability solutions, suppliers, technicians, engineers, researchers, consultants and journalists, among others, of those sectors in which Athelia is reference in identification and traceability.

title: Transcription profiling of rat bladder after inoculation with bladder cancer cells
description: Rat bladder cancer cells (AY-27 cell line) were inoculated intravesically into syngeneic female Fischer rats. The bladder was analyzed by histology and Affymetrix GeneChips and compared to bladders from sham operated and normal rats.
